content:
I'll create a new report based on the provided execution logs:

EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Coal Mining and Processing System (around position 41,-81)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position 41,-82) mining coal
- Wooden chest for coal storage (position 41.5,-80.5)
- Burner inserter (position 43.5,-80.5) configured to move items from position 42.5,-80.5 to 44.5,-80.5
- Stone furnace (position 45,-81)
- Transport belt group at position 42.5,-81.5 moving items rightward

Current status: System is partially blocked due to full storage chest (800 coal) and furnace fuel being full (50 coal)

ERROR TIPS

### Inventory Management Errors
- Ensure inventory has free slots before attempting to craft items
- Clear inventory space before attempting to pick up items
- Monitor and manage chest capacities to prevent system blockages

### Entity Placement Errors
- Verify required items are in inventory before attempting to place entities
- Ensure you have the correct items crafted before placement attempts

### System Design Issues
- Implement overflow protection for storage systems
- Consider implementing a more robust coal distribution system to prevent backup
- Monitor and manage furnace fuel levels to prevent overfilling

### Resource Extraction Issues
- Ensure proper positioning before attempting extraction operations
- Clear blockages in the production line when "WAITING_FOR_SPACE_IN_DESTINATION" status appears

NAMESPACE

Functions:
None defined in provided logs

Important Variables:
- storage_chest: WoodenChest
- first_inserter: BurnerInserter
- belt_group: List[Belt]

Entity States:
- BurnerMiningDrill: Can enter WAITING_FOR_SPACE_IN_DESTINATION state
- Chest: Can enter NORMAL state
- BurnerInserter: Can enter WAITING_FOR_SOURCE_ITEMS state
- Furnace: Can enter NO_INGREDIENTS state
